quote: Just moving into an S-Corporation structure can save you 15% on self-employment taxes.
why_clipworthy: This statistic highlights a significant financial benefit that can capture attention.
suggested_hook: Are you leaving money on the table? Discover how an S-Corp can save you thousands!

quote: The number one mistake that we see real estate agents making is co-mingling of funds.
why_clipworthy: Addresses a common mistake with a clear solution, offering immediate value.
suggested_hook: Avoid this common financial mistake that could cost you big time!
